entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] AOT-compiled applications in release mode include debug information #79197
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: System.IO.Ports is currently only supported on Windows. on Archlinux #79196
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic serialization with contract model cannot round-trip #79195
  • [API Proposal]: AsyncConfigurationProvider #79193
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle fileHandle) #79187
  • Named pipe Allow_Connection_UnderDifferentUsers_ForClientReading test fails on Mono on Windows #79180
  • [API Proposal]: Generic ArgumentNullException/ArgumentException that returns original value when not null #79179

Closed

  • nativeAOT whether to support winform or wpf programs? #79166
  • Plans to reduce object header size #79189
  • Difference in codegen of `string.IsNullOrEmpty()` #63116
    Future
  • CustomAttributeData.ConstructorArguments throws when retrieving a typeof() argument from an in-memory compilation #62659
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fold all local addresses in local morph #79194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79192
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [release/6.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79191
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Allocate static boxes on FOH #2 #79188
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Take EventListener.EventListenersLock in EventPipeEventDispatcher.SendCommand #79185
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add ProductVersionSuffix to workload manifest names #79184
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • A gentle reminder that TraceGC is turned off #79183
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fixing assert on variable live range for simd12 LCL / STORE_LCL #79182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange for null #79181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix XxHash3/XxHash128 DeriveSecretFromSeed scalar fallback on big endian #79186
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove getFieldAddress #79060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add stobj version for no reference case #79165
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix a build error on x86 with FEATURE_AUTO_TRACE turned on #79164
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix typos #79136
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Be more precise about choosing what to DNER in block morphing #77980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Map correct fmt for mov instruction #79174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix a NonBacktracking subsumption checking rule for XY|X??Y #79163
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update new ArgumentOutOfRangeException.Throw methods to include ActualValue #79157
    area-System.Runtime
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78984
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Using a literal field with stdsfld/ldsfld should trigger a MissingFieldException #79160
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Consecutive registers #77072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Improve CI triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Draft] Fix spurious OOMs #79158
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to 17/12/21 #2101
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Unify call lowering and codegen; support inline throw helpers #2103

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI test failure: Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.SdkCheck.Tests.GivenDotnetSdkCheck.WhenABundleIsOutOfSupportItPrintsWarning #29382
  • After upgrading to VS 2022 Preview 15.0.1- Unable to open the existing projects targeting the version 6.0 #29375

PullRequests

Created

  • extract common logging functionality into ApiSymbolExtensions #29379
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Skip one of the AllCommonItemsCreate test cases #29345
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29371
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29372
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't use C# LangVersion 1 w/ Roslyn (only version 2 onwards) #65751
  • Assertion failure in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.AnalysisState.PerAnalyzerState.TryStartSyntaxAnalysis #65750
  • CI test failure: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.CSharp.UnitTests.ConvertTupleToStruct.ConvertTupleToStructTests.ConvertSingleTupleTypeToRecord(host: OutOfProcess) #65749
  • Review all the non-infra changes in #65737 #65746
  • Avoid `compilation.GetSemanticModel` in analyzers #65744
  • `RegisterOperationAction` with `OperationKind.Attribute` doesn't work on local functions #65741
  • Inconsistency between `!= null` and `is not null` on NRTs #65740
  • Audit if new APIs added to IFileChangeWatcher.cs were intentionally public or not #65738

Closed

  • Big tagger delay in refreshing squiggles in the editor #65502
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding support for positional patterns to GenerateDeconstructMethodFixProvider.cs #65748
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add more test scenarios for symbol completion after scoped #65747
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove "Top Level statement attribute" from language feature status #65743
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove dotnet5 feed #65742
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Move repo to newer version of Public Api analyzers #65737
    Area-Analyzers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove redundant null check #65745
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Move IDS_FeatureRefLocalsReturns out of the parser #65710
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #65752
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE
  • Add "Make declaration partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Add fixer to offer to use `nameof(parameter)` in attributes now that the language allows that. #65729
    Area-IDE
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Cleanup unused generated code #65723
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • reduce the amount of time that we switch from a background thread to … #65641
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Find refs - Remove bogus assert and add test #65675
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Consider delegate default parameter values and `params` in symbol matcher #65579
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics (#65571) #65727
    Area-IDE
  • Implement parsing changes for Primary Constructors feature #65720
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Move to using ToListAndFree in more places in the parser. #65708
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 7 ValueGeneratedOnUpdate not working on Guid that is not a key #45444
  • Allow acr_values to be sent when client application sends code to authorization server using asp.net core OpenIdConnectHandler #45443
  • Perf regression: caching #45442
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #45441
  • Blazor Server Get Cookie before the first render #45435
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #45434
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mapaction #45433
  • Sending a request with empty body to an endpoint with a filter, returns the `Task` result on the response bdy when running with the Production environment #45432

Closed

  • Blazor server side JS interoperability throws an exception when IJSInProcessObjectReference is passed to InvokeAsync #45440
  • Perf regression: json_actix #45429
  • Debug blazor in vscode prompted "cannot launch browser: The URL's protocol must be one of "ws","wss:, or "ws+nuix;""" #45257
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Minimal API] Incorrect OpenAPI definition of path, query and header parameters when there is a body and we're using WithOpenApi extension method #45365
    8.0-preview1
  • .NET garbage collection doesn't run until memory pressure occurs #39483
    8.0-MQ

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45439
    area-web-frameworks
  • Bump decode-uri-component from 0.2.0 to 0.2.2 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #45438
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump decode-uri-component from 0.2.0 to 0.2.2 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #45437
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Resolve all descriptors from register #45436
    area-grpc
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more commands #45431
    area-commandlinetools

Merged

  • Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45404
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix typos in `docs/EventSourceAndCounters.md` #45430
    community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add support for JSON output to more commands #45383
    area-commandlinetools, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22580.8 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • [TS Client] Fix CompletionMessage result when passing false or null #45169
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • [release/7.0] Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45109
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2059652 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly to MVC Model Binding #45243
    blocked, area-web-frameworks
  • Vectorized HttpCharacters (and used IndexOfAnyValues in other places found) #45300
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Use built in methods #45426
    Perf
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
  • Warn the user if they're specifying protocols that won't be used #45352
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Template Projects not showing up in VS Community or Professional with Maui workload installed #11851
  • ScrollView doesn't resize when child scaled #11850
  • Multiple controls don't support theme changes properly on the fly #11849
  • VS 2022: deploy to Android issue #11848
  • CarouselView EmptyView not visible initially #11847
  • Suggest a possible optimization for `static Color GetNamedColor(ReadOnlySpan<char> value)`. #11846
  • Can't access Maui's xaml schema #11841

Closed

  • File | New | Maui app always picks .NET 6 the first time #11824
  • Button visual state doesn't reset to "Normal" after "Pressed" on Windows (similar to #5824) #9715
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Button.IsPressed #3942
  • Button Pressed VisualState not Reverting #8309
  • Missing PointerOver VisualState for Button on Windows #9119
    Backlog
  • MAUI app contains two pages with BlazorWebView control that throw an exception when the second page is called in Android #8502
    Backlog
  • Cant find toolbar as shown in the tutorial of .NET MAUI #11500

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11845
  • [net6.0] Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11844
  • [net7.0] Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11843
  • Add empty PointerOver states to Buttons to reduce confusion #11842
  • Reconcile PointerOver, Pressed, and Focused states #11840

Updated

  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11775
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Concurrency tokens with table-splitting and TPC throws #29751
  • Table-sharing synthesized concurrency tokens are not created in all cases #29750
  • The instance of entity type 'Domain' cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value '{Id: 2}' is already being tracked. When attaching existing entities, ensure that only one entity instance with a given key value is attached. #29749
  • Add a flag for DetectChanges for local methods that may do a full scan #29747
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Lookup entities by primary key, alternate key, or foreign key #29685
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase maximum line length #29748
  • Allow shared columns with nullable value converters #29746
  • Fix in-memory issues with value comparers #29745

Merged

  • Thanksgiving project: lookup entities by primary key, alternate key, or foreign key #29686

Updated

  • Handle row-version columns in owned types with conversions #29730
